description: Number of conjugacy classes of subgroups of the alternating group A_n.
comments: Number of even permutation groups; also number of molecular species based on even permutation groups. - _Christian G. Bower_, Feb 23 2006
links: L. Naughton and G. Pfeiffer, Integer Sequences Realized by the Subgroup Pattern of the Symmetric Group, arXiv preprint arXiv:1211.1911, 2012. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 02 2013
crossrefs: Cf. A000001, A000638. Unlabeled version of A029725. Euler transform of A116653.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Reiner Martin (reinermartin(AT)hotmail.com), Dec 30 2001
a(10)-a(13) added by _Christian G. Bower_, Feb 23 2006 based on Goetz Pfeiffer's web page.
